summary: Grove's spring release brings the forest to life with dancing cherry blossoms and seasonal charm. We've strengthened our AI sanctuary by adding human verification and expanding crawler protections, while laying new groundwork with Stripe integration and backend improvements. This update polishes animations, fixes authentication flows, and deepens our commitment to a serene, creator-focused platform.

features: add public roadmap with seasonal journey
enhance tree grounding and add dancing snowflake motion
make Grove logo tree pink in spring season
dramatically enhance petal gliding and dancing motion
unify vine background pattern across all Grove sites
Update plant site assets to align with Grove design system
update favicon to new grove logo design
add vision CTA before email signup
remove mountain layer and enhance clouds
fixes: prevent petals from appearing stuck at spawn position
separate petal fall and flutter animations to prevent conflict
correct cherry tree summer colors and particle visibility
improve petal falling motion and leaf fade-in behavior
improve particle animations for leaves, petals, and snowflakes
resolve OAuth flow and CSRF issues for signup
use canonical URL to prevent cookie domain mismatch
use /login endpoint instead of /authorize for GroveAuth
trigger landing deploy on docs changes
